articles.content: BENGALURU: Moodys Analytics on Monday lowered its global economic growth forecast to 2.7% for 2022 from 4.2% forecast in January, citing rising stagflation risks worldwide. It said the global environ… [+2594 chars]

articles.title: Holiday from hell in Romania: Cashless and living in four-day-old clothes - The Star Online
articles.description: You know you're getting old when you’re practically living on the streets of a small town in Europe and it’s not a big, fun adventure.
articles.content:
Currently, Im homeless in Suceava.
Im on a family trip to Romania, where my wife is from a little village out here, and within minutes of arriving at the farmhouse, our little boy was trembling from… [+4064 chars]
